replies.body: I love it how most of the people saying gold isnt that good are silvers xD

> [{quoted}](name=Yoshi Junior,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fNsUZ1BN,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-18T06:57:57.006+0000)
>
> I love it how most of the people saying gold isnt that good are silvers xD

Jealousy ;)
I don't want to seem rude, but that isn't an achievement.
How is it not an achievement?
I don't want to seem rude, but you don't have the right to tell me what is or isn't an achievement to me, asshole :)

So you posted on the boards expecting to actually be congratulated, and then get mad when people point out it's really not that good?

Like this is a post that was going to happen.

'expecting to be congratulated', nope I was just stating an achievement. I'm quite aware that people don't think it's good but there is no reason for them to point it out, literally none. The point of his comment was purely just to try and put me down and that's a real dick move.

>nope I was just stating an achievement.

I got the first one's free and the second one is also free achievement's in deadpool.

does that mean anyone else gives a fuck?

If you want to be mad at people that point out the obvious, then i'm sorry but no one is gonna care.
But the point is that there is no reason to 'point out the obvious'. If I'm happy with getting gold then leave it at that? It was an unnecessary and rude comment.

> [{quoted}](name=DiddlyDonger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fNsUZ1BN,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-17T11:58:23.110+0000)
>
> But the point is that there is no reason to 'point out the obvious'. If I'm happy with getting gold then leave it at that? It was an unnecessary and rude comment.

So was your post in that case, hes allowed and has posted his opinion, your post is just as irrelevant as his

so you don't want people to point out the obvious, and you want people just to leave it at that.....

Why did you post on boards exactly?

I wa sjust syaing its not really an accomplishment as gold is easy mode.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fNsUZ1BN,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-05-18T12:06:16.546+0000)
>

> 
> Diddly's current rank.

You make it out as if what I said didn't make sense.

25.74% means (roughly) one out of four people who have played at least 10 ranked games this season is at least gold V or above, which is what I said.

Well considering that's only the case on OCE, it's not really a factor, Gold V in NA is something like 33%, we just have a smaller server.

Not to mention, there are like 2 million ranked players that are Gold V or up.
